basics.name: Giorgio Tran
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a postbaccalaureate student at the University of Hawaii looking to pursue a Master's Degree in Computer Science in 2023.

highlights: Update Excel spreadsheets and Microsoft Access databases with customers data
Effectively provide customer service and manage inbound phone calls

work.company: John Andrew Burns School of Medicine
highlights: Conducted gene therapy experiments on a hemophilic mouse model with a novel ultrasound-based approach
Evaluated the efficiency of experiments through analytical laboratory techniques and interpreted data
Presented findings at the Spring 2021 Undergraduate Showcase
Solved technical computer issues that patrons had
Ensured that patrons adhered to computer lab policies
Communicated effectively with customers in order to determine their needs
Worked with a team to best serve customers
Performed inventory management and kept the sales floor well maintained
